mapper.insert: insert into emailtable (title, content, attachfilename, attachfile) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{attachfilename}, #{attachfile})
insert into rsrecordtable (id_r, email_r, id_s, email_s, id_email, sendtime, isopen) values (#{id_r}, #{email_r}, #{id_s}, #{email_s}, #{id_email}, now(), 0)
mapper.select: select * from busertable order by bemail
SELECT * from rsrecordtable rt, emailtable et where et.id = rt.id_email and rt.isdelete = 0 group by rt.id_email order by rt.id desc;
SELECT * from rsrecordtable rt, emailtable et where rt.id_r = #{id} and et.id = rt.id_email and rt.isdelete = 0 order by rt.id desc;
SELECT * from rsrecordtable rt, emailtable et where rt.id_s = #{id} and et.id = rt.id_email and rt.isdelete = 0 order by rt.id desc;
select * from rsrecordtable rt, emailtable et where rt.id = #{id} and rt.id_email = et.id
mapper.update: update rsrecordtable set isopen=1 where id = #{id}
update rsrecordtable set isdelete=1 where id = #{id}
update rsrecordtable set isdelete=1 where id_email = #{id}
update busertable set islock=1 where id = #{id}
update busertable set islock=0 where id = #{id}
